powers.name: Villain_Pets.Night_Widow.Stealth
powers.display_help: You blend into your environment and can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense.

display_info: 7.50% strength to ranged, melee, AoE for 3.25s on self

powers.name: Villain_Pets.Night_Widow.Mental_Training
powers.display_help: The Fortunata Night Widow is resistant to Psionic Damage, as well as Sleep, Hold, Immobilization and Disorient effects. They have improved Defense and Accuracy.

display_info: 25.00% resistance to psionic damage for 10.25s on self
33.00% resistance to hold, immobilize, stun, sleep for 10s on self
5.00% strength to ranged, melee, AoE for 10s on self
10.00% strength to psionic for 10s on self

powers.name: Villain_Pets.Night_Widow.Smoke_Grenade
powers.display_help: Your visual range and chance to hit have been reduced by the Smoke Grenade. Note that Smoke Grenade is unaffected by Recharge Time changes

powers.name: Villain_Pets.Night_Widow.Mental_Blast
powers.display_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate. Note that Mental Blast is unaffected by Recharge Time changes

display_info: -30.00% strength to recharge for 6s on target

powers.name: Villain_Pets.Night_Widow.Swipe
powers.display_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced. Note that Swipe is unaffected by Recharge Time changes

display_info: 2 ticks of 11.12 lethal damage over 0.6s on target
16.68 lethal damage on target after 1.1s delay
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 4s on target
-10.00% strength to recharge for 2s on target
-20.00% strength to jump height for 4s on target
3 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.56 toxic damage over 2.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Villain_Pets.Night_Widow.Lunge
powers.display_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced. Note that Lunge is unaffected by Recharge Time changes

display_info: -20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 6s on target
-10.00% strength to recharge for 4s on target
-20.00% strength to jump height for 6s on target
4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.56 toxic damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Villain_Pets.Night_Widow.Strike

display_info: -20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 6s on target
-10.00% strength to recharge for 4s on target
-20.00% strength to jump height for 6s on target
4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 5.56 toxic damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
